reviews.text: My wife and I have made quite a few trips over to Amsterdam/Haarlem over the years and this was probably the best place we have stayed at. There are so many good things we can sat about staying here, but we don't want to because if they become too popular we might struggle to book again. So go stay somewherelse! Besides the stairs were very steep, the bed was very soft and that bathroom door just didn't close properley. So you really wouldn't fancy it now, would you? So I wouldn't stay there if I was you! But we will be, because we loved it!
reviews.title: Excellent. But don't tell everyone!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even though the De Gravin apartment is in the city centre, it is tucked away up a small side street, so very quiet and calm. It's an absolute gem - spacious, pristinely clean and comfortable, with modern furnishings in a quirky building. There is everything you could want in the kitchen, and the bedrooms are most comfortable. It is warm and cosy too. A particular strength of HotelSuites is the quality of the staff - helpful, friendly, genuine and prepared to offer advice about where to eat and what to see. We had a lovely stay.
reviews.title: A wonderful place to stay, right in the centre of Haarlem...

reviews.text: Have stayed in all four apartments several times.
reviews.title: If you are going to Haarlem these are the people you want to contact!

reviews.text: Have taken family and friends also who have all loved the apartments and the ease of booking through to checking out!
reviews.title: Very nice stay in Haarlem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the apartments are clean, airy an homely. I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Haarlem.
reviews.title: Great apartment in central Haarlem…
